title: Result of a decrease in taxes and adm i

content.question: Suppose that the government decreases taxes and at the same time the central bank decreases its administered interest rates. The combined actions will result in

choices.label: an increase in unemployment and a decrease in the interest rate
an increase in unemployment and an increase in the interest rate
an increase in the real gross domestic product and a decrease in the interest rate
an increase in the real gross domestic product and an increase in the interest rate
an increase in the real gross domestic product and an indeterminate change in the interest rate

content.answer: an increase in the real gross domestic product and an indeterminate change in the interest rate
